3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and volume. Proper wall corner geometry and floor/wall separation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity layout including the detached garage. Room adjacencies and wall proportions are nearly perfect.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and bathroom fixtures are represented, though moveable furniture (beds/sofas) is absent.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. One minor text watermark on a kitchen element prevents a perfect score.

detected_errors.description: Loose furniture (beds, lounge suite) from floor plan intent not rendered.
Small text artifact 'VIB' visible on kitchen base cabinet.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that faithfully maintains the complex geometry and layout of the original floor plan.
